titleStmt.title: His Majesties proclamation, concerning the Book of common-prayer, and the Directory for publike vvorship. (Given at Oxford, Novemb. 13. 1645.) With some observations thereupon.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I),
Westminster Assembly (1643-1652)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University: and re-printed at London, by R. Austin.,

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false. "This is a defence of the Directory against the King's Proclamation, and so there never was an Oxford edition of this piece, but only of the Proclamation itself"--Madan.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Vide ye folio printed at Oxon the 13 No: 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
